name: Lone Star Dive: Fears of Mars
name_original: Lone Star Dive: Fears of Mars
description:
NASA does its job: mars.nasa.gov/insight/

"InSight is a Mars lander designed to give the Red Planet its first thorough checkup since it formed 4.5 billion years ago."

whoa, can you believe it?

it's happening, folks.

and so there is a Martian mod of Lone Star Dive, the game (still unreleased), here.
